full_text:
Monday, July 18, 2005

Michele Pagan
Palm Beach Police Department
345 South County Road
Palm Beach, FL 33480

Subject: Subpoena

Your request for telephone records has been received in this office and we will supply the records as soon as possible. File number "BST05078732" has been assigned to your request.

The fee charged for the work required to produce the records is as follows:

1. If you requested all incoming and outgoing calls (local and long distance), referred to as "verbatim," the billing rate is a minimum of $35.00 per telephone number for up to seven consecutive days of records. There is an additional charge of $5.00 for each additional consecutive day, per number.

A bill with the exact amount due will accompany the information you requested. The approximate cost to supply the requested information will be $745.00.

If you have any questions regarding the status of your request, please call me at 404-986-5630. Please refer to the file number listed above when calling. PLEASE RESPOND WITHIN 24 HOURS IF YOU WISH TO CANCEL THIS REQUEST. IF WE DO NOT HEAR FROM YOU, YOUR RESPONSE WILL BE MAILED/FAXED AS REQUESTED.

Lucille Smith
BellSouth Subpoena Center
P.O. Box 54407
Atlanta, GA 30308

07/26/17
Page 32 of 104
Public Records Request No.: 17-295
DOJ-OGR-00031649

additional_notes: The document appears to be a letter from BellSouth Subpoena Center to Palm Beach Police Department regarding a subpoena for telephone records. The letter is dated July 18, 2005, and was likely scanned or copied at a later date, as indicated by the date '07/26/17' at the bottom of the page.
